content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Include dimensions in the Journal entry inquiry report

content_parts.content: From the Journal entry inquiry page, you can include dimensions and attributes in the journal entries export to support dimensional analysis in your external accounting software.

You can filter on the line status for sales and purchasing documents.

This is not included on purchasing invoices and credit memos.
On the Job scheduler page, you can schedule batch tasks with detailed settings like start and end dates and frequency for a specific job. Track current and past jobs on the Batch task history page.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-51199,XT-50633,XT-50622,XT-50461,XT-50075,XT-49993,XT-49896)

content_parts.title: Item page: Item description is limited to 250 characters

content_parts.content: The item description is increased to a maximum length of 250 characters.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)")

content_parts.content: On the Stock inquiry page, a dynamic list displays the items with additional information about the quantities and the total stock value. You can sort, filter, and group by Item ID, Name, Category, and Site.

content_parts.title: Sales credit memo and sales shipment batch printing from the main list

content_parts.content: From the Sales credit memo and Sales shipment main lists, you can select and print multiple records. From the Batch task history page, you can track the progress of batch actions from the Logs tab, and you can download reports.
From the Purchase receipt page, you can print the purchase receipt to track the actual receipt against the delivery note.

content_parts.title: Automatic detailed stock deallocation on sales orders and work orders

content_parts.content:
• On the Sales order page, you can select Deallocate stock to deallocate stock records from the sales order lines for items that are stock managed. A deallocation request is created for the partially or fully stock allocated sales order lines that are pending or in progress. You can still manually deallocate stock per sales order line.
  • On the Work order page, you can select Deallocate stock to deallocate stock records from the work order component lines for items that are stock managed. A deallocation request is created for the partially or fully stock allocated work order component lines that are pending or in progress. You can still manually deallocate stock per line.

content_parts.title: Automatic detailed stock allocation on sales orders

content_parts.content: On the Sales order page, you can use the Allocate stock action to allocate stock records to the sales order lines.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Add internal notes to Purchase invoices and Purchase returns

content_parts.content: On the purchase invoices and purchase returns, you can add internal notes for the entire document and for each line.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-51199,XT-50633,XT-50622,XT-50461,XT-50075,XT-49993,XT-49896)

content_parts.content: The tax determination rules can return no tax without any errors. The document displays with a tax calculation failed status when the tax is mandatory.

content_parts.title: Sales orders: Shipping a line item with a failed tax calculation removes ship-to address and creates new shipment

content_parts.content: In Sales orders, when shipping a line item that has a failed tax calculation, the ship-to-address details are kept and a separate sales shipment is no longer created.

content_parts.title: Tax date information column should not display in sales order line grid

content_parts.content: The tax date does not display in the sales order lines.

content_parts.title: When filtering data on the Sales order line inquiry page, the totals displayed do not update when the grid data is filtered

content_parts.content: When exiting the 'Sales order line inquiry' page, you are no longer prompted to save changes. In addition, an asterisk indicates that the 'Company' field is a required field.

content_parts.title: Purchase and sales documents: incorrect date format

content_parts.content:
For the following reports, the date format is based on the user’s connection language:
Packing slip
Purchase order
Sales credit memo
Sales invoice
Sales order
Sales order quote
Sales shipment picklist

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Finance' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-51199,XT-50633,XT-50622,XT-50461,XT-50075,XT-49993,XT-49896)

content_parts.title: Entering a purchase invoice creates a generic error

content_parts.content: Posting a purchase invoice generated a validation error when the underlying purchase receipt was not yet invoiced, contained items that were non-lot-managed, and were previously upgraded with a script. This has now been corrected.

content_parts.content:
A new Work in progress inquiry displays a summary of costs by work order.
The previous Work in progress inquiry is renamed Work in progress transaction inquiry and displays the cost of individual trackings.

content_parts.title: Error when adding dimensions to a work order

content_parts.content: An error is no longer displayed when adding work order dimensions.

content_parts.title: Unclear screen displays when attempting to change roles more than once

content_parts.content: Screen rendering optimized.

content_parts.title: Not all dropdown menu values are visible

content_parts.content: Field height calculation improved so that all values are visible.

content_parts.title: Item ID does not remain in the assigned location in the Components grid on Work orders

content_parts.content: Configured column order is retained when changing records.

content_parts.title: Empty categories excluded from grouped main list data

content_parts.content: Empty categories included in grouped main list data.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Stock' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)")

content_parts.title: MRP calculation results: Item ID and column filters

content_parts.content: Column filters have been added to the Details grid in the MRP calculation results page. The Item ID is also displayed.
The Stock valuation report runs asynchronously to generate a set of valuation results by user.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'User experience' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (33.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Miscellaneous improvement for sales and purchasing documents

content_parts.content:
Miscellaneous improvements include:

  • A warning icon alerts you if a customer is on hold.
  • Purchase invoice single status includes the matching status and the stock status.
  • Purchase credit memo single status includes the stock transaction status.
  • The Printed and Sent statuses for individual documents displays as a checkbox.
  • For sales orders, the Open action is only available on closed lines.
  • The tax calculation status includes Not done and In progress.

content_parts.title: Key information displays on sales and purchasing documents

content_parts.content:
The main record display for sales and purchasing documents include:

  • A step flow that displays a horizontal list of steps in the document process. The current step is highlighted.
  • An indicator bar displays key information like amounts, totals, and dates. Indicators displayed vary by document type.

Some indicators include icons:

  • A checkmark when the earliest date expected is not reached when the minimum amount is reached.
  • A warning when the earliest date expected is reached when the minimum amount is not reached, and saving the record is possible.
  • An error when the earliest date expected is reached when the minimum amount is not reached, and saving the record is not possible.
